summary: Lets your player have a deeper or higher sounding shout.
descriptionHtml:
Real Shout

Mod that deepens or lightens the shouts of human males (redguards, nords, imperials, bretons). NPCs in the game that use shouts have their own separate shouts that are unaffected by this mod. It\'s purpose is to let you tailor your character\'s shout if you think the default shout is too high or too low for your character.

It\'s been tested on my system, works with no issues.
How does it sound?
- Deeper shouts are about as deep as the orcs, klingons, the Hulk, James Earl Jones, etc
- Higher shouts are about as high as the elves, grown-up Frodo Baggins, Legolas, Spider Man, etc

Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ekc0xLfbDrU&feature=channel_video_title
Deeper is first half of clip, Higher is second half of clip.
author: Blocky
